title: styles.css
content: A.menu1:link {font-weight: bold; color: white; text-decoration: none; } A.menu1:visited {font-weight: bold; color: orange; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; } A.menu1:hover {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; } A.menu1:active {font-weight: bold; color: white; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; } A.city:link {font-weight: bold; color: navy; text-decoration: none; } A.city:visited {font-weight: bold; color: orange; text-decoration: none; } A.city:hover {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.city:active {font-weight: bold; color: blue; text-decoration: none; } A.city1:link { color: navy; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: white; border: white 1px solid; padding-left: 3px; padding-right: 3px; } A.city1:visited {color: orange; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: white; border: white 1px solid; padding-left: 3px; padding-right: 3px; } A.city1:hover {color: white; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: orange; border: navy 1px solid; padding-left: 3px; padding-right: 3px; } A.city1:active {color: red; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; background-color: white; border: white 1px solid; padding-left: 3px; padding-right: 3px; } A.booknow:link {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow:visited {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow:hover {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow:active {font-weight: bold; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.moredetails:link {font-weight: bold; color:#505050; text-decoration: none; } A.moredetails:visited {font-weight: bold; color:#505050; text-decoration: none; } A.moredetails:hover {font-weight: bold; color:#505050; text-decoration: none; } A.moredetails:active {font-weight: bold; color:#505050; text-decoration: none; } A.hotelname:link {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color: #cc0000; text-decoration: none; } A.hotelname:visited {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color: #ff6600; text-decoration: none; } A.hotelname:hover {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color: red; text-decoration: none; } A.hotelname:active {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color:#505050; text-decoration: none; } body { background: #ffffff; font-family: Arial, Verdana; font-size:small; margin-top: 0px; } div.body { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 880px; } div.title {font-weight:bold; font-size:larger; font-style: italic; color: navy; } div.smaller {font-size: smaller ; color: #333366; } input, select, textarea { font-size:-2px;color: brown; background-color: #f4c582;border: brown 1px solid; } input.buttonsubmit { font-weight: bold; color: white; background-color: red; border: red 2px outset; cursor:pointer; } table.tabelasearch { background-color: #FAF3F0; BORDER: navy 1px solid; } td.searchtop {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color: brown; background-color: orange; BORDER-RIGHT: navy 1px solid; BORDER-TOP: navy 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: navy 1px solid; } b.searchtext {font-weight: normal; color: navy; } td.continent {font: bold 16px; color: navy; background-color: #FAF3F0; BORDER: navy 1px solid; } table.recbox {BORDER: #febfbf 1px solid; MARGIN-top: 2px; MARGIN-bottom: 3px; } tr.rec1 {background-color:#FFF8E3;} table.rectitle {background-color: #FFEBAE; BORDER-bottom: #febfbf 1px solid; padding-top: 0px; padding-left: 3px; } span.opishotelu { font-size:x-small; color:#663300; } b.sd { font-size : 11px; color:red; } .hotelin {font-weight: bold; color: navy; } td.topdest1 {background-color: #D9ECFF; BORDER: white 0px solid; } td.topdest2 {font-weight: bold ; color: white; } a.topdest { white-space:nowrap; } td.linia {BORDER-right: navy 1px solid;} hr.dol {margin-top: 3px; color: navy; } div.tol {font-weight: bold; color: navy; text-align:center} div.allhotels {font-weight:bold; font-size:large; color:Navy; text-align:center; padding:5px; } div.bestdeal {font-weight: bold; font-size:large; color:#cc0000; text-align:center; padding:3px; } td.continent {font-weight: bold; font-size:larger; color:Navy; background-color: #FAF3F0; BORDER: navy 1px solid; text-align:center; } div.headtext { padding: 5px 10px; color:Navy; } div.headtext b {font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%; } p.hotelName { font-weight:bold; font-size:large; color:#cc0000; } p.description { color:Navy } table.rooms {width: 100%; table-layout: fixed; BORDER: #6699ff 1px solid; margin: 10px 0 0 0; border-collapse: collapse; } tr.roomshead {height: 30px; text-align: center; background: #dddddd; BORDER-bottom: #6699ff 1px solid; font-weight: bold; } tr.roomsprices td { height: 30px; text-align: center; BORDER: #eeeeee 1px solid; } td.room {font-weight: bold; background: #eeeeee; } /* style do bookingu w wyszukiwarce */ A.booknow2:link {font-weight: bold; color: red; background: none; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow2:visited {font-weight: bold; color: orange; background: none; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow2:hover {font-weight: bold; color: red; background: none; text-decoration: none; } A.booknow2:active {font-weight: bold; color: blue; background: none; text-decoration: none; } .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_container { border:1px solid #646464; background-color: lemonchiffon; color: brown; } .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_active { background-color:#f4c582; } .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_other .ajax__calendar_day { color:Silver; } .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_dayname { background-color:PaleGoldenrod;} .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_invalid .ajax__calendar_day { color:silver; text-decoration:line-through; cursor:default;} .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_invalid .ajax__calendar_month { color:silver; text-decoration:line-through; cursor:default;} .HA_ajax__calendar .ajax__calendar_invalid .ajax__calendar_year { color:silver; text-decoration:line-through; cursor:default;}
